gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `AmountAcquisitionCosts` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `AmountAcquisitionCosts` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_AmountAcquisitionCostsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InsuranceInCashMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InsuranceInCashMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract4_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentInsuranceMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentInsuranceMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract6_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract6_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract6_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract6_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_MutationReportingYearAcquisitionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfMutationReportingYearAcquisitionCostsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ProvisionsForInsuranceLiabilitiesMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ProvisionsForInsuranceLiabilitiesMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedProvisionsAcquisitionCostsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
